title: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC v6.10.1 + Patch [Mac OSX]
description: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC – Capture the full range of light. Create amazing images from challenging high-contrast scenes. New HDR Merge lets you combine multiple photos taken with different exposure settings into a single high dynamic range image. Create natural-looking or surreal images from extremely high-contrast scenes. Using HDR Merge, you can easily combine multiple shots taken with different exposure settings into a single high dynamic range image. Capture superwide fields of view and amazing detail. Photomerge technology lets you stitch together multiple images, including raw files, to create seamless panoramas. Import and perfect your photos faster than ever. Lightroom takes advantage of compatible graphics processors to boost its overall speed, especially when you’re enhancing images in the Develop module. Quickly find images of family and friends, even without metadata tags. Select a face in one photo, and Lightroom searches for that person in all your other images. Categorize and group your photos based on faces. Create beautiful, polished slide shows using still images, video and music along with professional effects like pan and zoom. Showcase your work in more elegant, engaging and interactive web galleries. New HTML5-compatible gallery templates work with the widest range of desktop and mobile browsers. Precisely control which parts of your image are affected by the Graduated or Radial filters. Now you can use a brush to edit the filter’s mask, adding or subtracting filter effects wherever you want

parsed.dn: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC v6.10.1   Patch [Mac OSX]
parsed.name: Adobe Photoshop Lightroom CC v6.10.1   Patch [Mac OSX]
